metadata.name: utility_scale_solar
metadata.description: Assumptions and inputs for a utility‑scale solar PV project

dc_ac_ratio.title: DC/AC ratio
dc_ac_ratio.description: The ratio of DC to AC capacity (DC÷AC).

performance_ratio.title: Performance ratio
performance_ratio.description: Overall system performance ratio accounting for system losses (0–1)

degradation.title: Degradation rate
degradation.description: Annual module degradation rate (fraction per year).

contingency_percent.title: Contingency (%)
contingency_percent.description: Contingency as a percentage of base EPC cost.

fixed_om_per_kw.title: Fixed O&M ($/kW‑yr)
fixed_om_per_kw.description: Annual fixed operations & maintenance cost per kW (e.g. $23/kW‑yr)

ppa_price.title: PPA price ($/MWh)
ppa_price.description: Power purchase agreement price for contracted energy.

ppa_escalator.title: PPA escalator (fraction)
ppa_escalator.description: Annual escalator for PPA price, e.g. 0.02 for 2%/yr

merchant_percentage.title: Merchant share (%)
merchant_percentage.description: Percentage of output sold into merchant market.

debt_fraction.title: Debt fraction
debt_fraction.description: Portion of total capital funded with debt (0–1)

equity_return_target.title: Equity return target (IRR)
equity_return_target.description: Target equity IRR for project investors.

itc_percent.title: Investment Tax Credit (%)
itc_percent.description: Percentage of eligible basis eligible for ITC.

ppa_plus_minus.title: PPA price variations
ppa_plus_minus.description: Array of PPA price multipliers to test (e.g. [0.9, 1.0, 1.1]).
